title: Shattered Souls: Trina Joseph
itunes:title: Shattered Souls: Trina Joseph
description:
Join veteran forensic investigator Karen Smith on the Shattered Souls podcast! 

Aubrey Joseph turned himself in after murdering his wife — but he told a much different story than the one told by evidence he left behind. It’s up to the detectives to make sense of the details, follow the evidence to find the lies, and give Trina Joseph a chance at justice.

Subscribe to the Shattered Souls podcast and catch up on all of Season 1 available now:

Apple Podcast

iHeart

Spotify

Music: The New Real by Sam Johnson at www.samjohnsonlive.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
